EmailTemplate.name: Document Rejection
EmailTemplate.subject: [C2L-PHL] Document Rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Applicant_Name__c}, The {!Launchpad__Type__c} you have uploaded for your C2L-PHL Youth Application has been rejected for {!Rejection_Reason__c}.
Log in to to re-upload.
Please reach out to {Placeholder Support Info} if you need assistance.
